parameters.visibleInPreview:
Whether the watermark image is visible in the local video preview:
     true: (Default) The watermark image is visible in the local preview.
     false: The watermark image is not visible in the local preview.

parameters.positionInLandscapeMode: The area to display the watermark image in landscape mode.

parameters.positionInPortraitMode: The area to display the watermark image in portrait mode.
